Well, there is no other nation like us in the whole world. The whole universe is blue-yellow. We are strong, indomitable, strong-willed. And we will defeat that poor army. And God willing, we will defeat that damned diabetes. And whoever doesn't like it, let him go another way. There are things, actions - priceless. Every person has a gift. The gift of being human.
